title: Ancient chinese paintings in America
creator_credit: Wan-go Wen, China Institute in America and Harmon Foundation
brief_description: Produced by the Harmon Foundation, USA, this film uses selected examples from the Chinese collections in three leading American museums. Mr. Wango Weng presents a survey of the history of chinese painting, and the representative art of each dynasty is shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Wan-go Wen, China Institute in America and Harmon Foundation
